import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useCart } from '../context/CartContext'; const Navbar = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const { getCartItemsCount } = useCart(); const cartCount = getCartItemsCount(); return ( <> {/* Sale Banner */}
MARCH SALE - 40% OFF! Sale is Running, Hurry Up And Get Your 40% OFF!
{/* Main Navigation */}
{/* Logo */}
TG
THEGEM {/* Desktop Navigation Links */}
NEW IN SALE CLOTHES SHOES WOMEN MEN KIDS MAIN SHOP
{/* Search and Cart Icons */}
3 {/* Mobile menu button */}
{/* Mobile Navigation Menu */} {isMenuOpen && (
ABOUT NEW IN SALE CLOTHES SHOES WOMEN MEN KIDS MAIN SHOP
)}
); }; export default Navbar;
